org.tantalum.net.xml

Class XMLModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.tantalum.net.xml.XMLModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RSSModel

    public abstract class XMLModel
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    XMLModel is a data structure extracted from XML text. The simplified parsing and integration to utility methods allows these to work online and offline (using RMS) transparent to the application developer using the caching classes. For an example of how to use this for your XML data format, see RSSModel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      A hierarchical list of XML attributes lower in the DOM tree than the current element during SAX parsing.

      protected int currentDepth
      During SAX parsing, the current XML tag history depth.
      protected java.lang.String[] qnameStack
      A hierarchical list of XML tags appearing lower in a DOM tree than the current tag during parsing.

    • Field Detail

      • qnameStack

        protected java.lang.String[] qnameStack
        A hierarchical list of XML tags appearing lower in a DOM tree than the current tag during parsing. The entire DOM model is not saved, but you can use this hierarchy for similar parse-time hierarchical condition logic. In most simple XML cases you do not need this information.

      • charStack

        protected java.lang.String[] charStack
        A hierarchical list of XML bodies lower in the DOM tree than the current element during SAX parsing.

      • attributeStack

        protected XMLAttributes[] attributeStack
        A hierarchical list of XML attributes lower in the DOM tree than the current element during SAX parsing.

      • currentDepth

        protected int currentDepth
        During SAX parsing, the current XML tag history depth. This increases as we enter each tag, and decreases as we leave.
